DOES BABY NEED SPECIAL CARE OR MONITORING?
Some babies may have risk factors that do not meet criteria for referral, but for which special 
care or monitoring is nevertheless required, to be sure that the baby stays safe. For example, 
small or premature babies may appear healthy, but they are in fact much more suscepti-
ble to complications in the first hours and days after birth. Checklist users should confirm
